text: Supernatants from THP-1 reporter cells were incubated with Quanti-Blue substrate ( Invivogen ) at 37degreesC and allowed to develop for 16-18 hours .

Quanti-Blue contains a substrate for <extra_id_0> alkaline phosphatase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and changes in the amount of NF-kappaB / AP-1 activity were quantified by optical density ( lambda = 655 ) measured using a SpectraMax 384 Plus plate reader and SoftMax Pro software ( Molecular Devices ) .
